content.query:
CREATE PROC [dbo].[cleanTweets]

AS
BEGIN
update dbo.NATO_Tweets1 set cleanText=text;
UPDATE dbo.NATO_Tweets1 
SET text = CASE 

             WHEN CHARINDEX('https', text) > 0 
             THEN LEFT(text, CHARINDEX('https', text) - 1) 
             ELSE text 
           END;
           delete from dbo.NATO_Tweets1 where text='';
END
